DOC.brief_summary: Phase 1 Evaluate the safety and tolerability of RAD001 in combination with sorafenib in patients with advance hepatocellular cancer (HCC) and to determine the maximum tolerated dose (MTD) Phase 2 To estimate the treatment effect as a measure of anti-tumor activity in terms of Time to Progression (TTP) of the combination of RAD001 plus sorafenib, at the MTD, as compared to sorafenib alone
DOC.brief_title: Global Study Looking at the Combination of RAD001 and Sorafenib to Treat Patients With Advanced Hepatocellular Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: Advanced liver cancer No previous systemic therapy for liver cancer Measurable disease on CT or MRI ECOG 1 or less ChildPugh A Active bleeding during the last 30 days Known history of HIV seropositivity Any severe and/or uncontrolled medical conditions including Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
